anonymousPlatform.title: Anonymous Content Platform
anonymousPlatform.description: This platform allows users to share content anonymously without registration
anonymousPlatform.content: This website is designed as an anonymous content sharing platform where users can publish articles, stories, poems, and thoughts without creating accounts or providing personal information.

contentResponsibility.title: Content Responsibility
contentResponsibility.userResponsibility: User Responsibility: All content published on this platform is the sole responsibility of the person who submitted it. Users are responsible for ensuring their content complies with applicable laws and regulations.
contentResponsibility.noModeration: No Content Moderation: Due to the anonymous nature of this platform, we do not pre-moderate content. However, we reserve the right to remove content that violates our terms or applicable laws.

prohibitedContent.title: Prohibited Content
prohibitedContent.intro: The following types of content are strictly prohibited:
items: Illegal content or content that promotes illegal activities
Hate speech, harassment, or content targeting individuals or groups
Content that infringes on intellectual property rights
Spam, malicious links, or attempts to distribute malware
Content that promotes violence or self-harm

privacy.title: Privacy & Data Collection
privacy.noPersonalData: No Personal Data: We do not collect personal information, email addresses, or require user registration. The platform is designed to be truly anonymous.
privacy.technicalData: Technical Data: We may collect basic technical information such as IP addresses for security purposes and to prevent abuse, but this data is not linked to user identities.
privacy.contentStorage: Content Storage: All submitted content is stored on our servers. While we don't track authorship, the content itself becomes part of our database.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.noWarranties: No Warranties: This platform is provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any content.
liability.userContent: User Content: We are not responsible for user-generated content and do not endorse any opinions, recommendations, or advice expressed by users.
liability.serviceAvailability: Service Availability: We do not guarantee continuous availability of the service and reserve the right to modify or discontinue the platform at any time.

contentRemoval.title: Content Removal
contentRemoval.reporting: Reporting: If you encounter content that violates these terms, please report it through appropriate channels. Due to the anonymous nature of the platform, we cannot provide direct contact methods within the platform itself.
contentRemoval.removalProcess: Removal Process: We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these terms or applicable laws without prior notice.

legalCompliance.title: Legal Compliance
legalCompliance.jurisdiction: Jurisdiction: This platform operates under applicable laws and regulations. Users are responsible for ensuring their content complies with laws in their jurisdiction.
legalCompliance.lawEnforcement: Law Enforcement: We will cooperate with law enforcement agencies when required by law, though our ability to provide user information is limited due to our anonymous design.
